description: Describes Capacity Block extension offerings available for purchase in the Amazon Web Services Region that you're currently using.

parameters.name: CapacityBlockExtensionDurationHours
parameters.description: The duration of the Capacity Block extension offering in hours.

parameters.name: CapacityReservationId
parameters.description: The ID of the Capacity reservation to be extended.

nested_items.name: CapacityBlockExtensionOfferings
nested_items.description: The recommended Capacity Block extension offerings for the dates specified.

nested_items.name: CapacityBlockExtensionOfferingId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Capacity Block extension offering.

nested_items.name: InstanceType
nested_items.description: The instance type of the Capacity Block that will be extended.

nested_items.name: InstanceCount
nested_items.description: The number of instances in the Capacity Block extension offering.

nested_items.name: AvailabilityZone
nested_items.description: The Availability Zone of the Capacity Block that will be extended.

nested_items.name: AvailabilityZoneId
nested_items.description: The Availability Zone ID of the Capacity Block that will be extended.

nested_items.name: StartDate
nested_items.description: The start date of the Capacity Block that will be extended.

nested_items.name: CapacityBlockExtensionStartDate
nested_items.description: The date and time at which the Capacity Block extension will start. This date is also the same as the end date of the Capacity Block that will be extended.

nested_items.name: CapacityBlockExtensionEndDate
nested_items.description: The date and time at which the Capacity Block extension expires. When a Capacity Block expires, the reserved capacity is released and you can no longer launch instances into it. The Capacity Block's state changes to expired when it reaches its end date.

nested_items.name: CapacityBlockExtensionDurationHours
nested_items.description: The amount of time of the Capacity Block extension offering in hours.

nested_items.name: UpfrontFee
nested_items.description: The total price of the Capacity Block extension offering, to be paid up front.

nested_items.name: CurrencyCode
nested_items.description: The currency of the payment for the Capacity Block extension offering.

nested_items.name: Tenancy
nested_items.description: Indicates the tenancy of the Capacity Block extension offering. A Capacity Block can have one of the following tenancy settings:
default - The Capacity Block is created on hardware that is shared with other Amazon Web Services accounts.
dedicated - The Capacity Block is created on single-tenant hardware that is dedicated to a single Amazon Web Services account.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The token to use to retrieve the next page of results. This value is null when there are no more results to return.
